6-year-old.context: A 6-year-old boy who underwent tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy two weeks ago.

tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy.context: Underwent tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy two weeks ago.

loud snoring at night.context: Symptoms included loud snoring at night, sinus infections, throat infections, not sleeping well, and fatigue.

sinus infections.context: Symptoms included loud snoring at night, sinus infections, throat infections, not sleeping well, and fatigue.

throat infections.context: Symptoms included loud snoring at night, sinus infections, throat infections, not sleeping well, and fatigue.

not sleeping well.context: Symptoms included loud snoring at night, sinus infections, throat infections, not sleeping well, and fatigue.

fatigue.context: Symptoms included loud snoring at night, sinus infections, throat infections, not sleeping well, and fatigue.

Augmentin.context: He finished up his Augmentin, by a day or two later he was off the Lortab.

Lortab.context: He finished up his Augmentin, by a day or two later he was off the Lortab.

acidic foods.context: No swallowing difficulty except he does not like the taste of acidic foods such as tomato sauce.

tomato sauce.context: No swallowing difficulty except he does not like the taste of acidic foods such as tomato sauce.

nasal discharge.context: He has not had any nasal discharge or ever had any bleeding.

bleeding.context: He has not had any nasal discharge or ever had any bleeding.

breathing better.context: He seems to be breathing better.

pharynx is well healed.context: Exam looks good. The pharynx is well healed.

tongue mobility is normal.context: Exam looks good. The pharynx is well healed. Tongue mobility is normal.

voice sounds clear.context: Exam looks good. The pharynx is well healed. Tongue mobility is normal. Voice sounds clear.

nasal passages reveal no discharge or cr.context: Nasal passages reveal no discharge or crusting.

ibuprofen.context: I told Mom it is okay to use some ibuprofen in case his mouth or jaws are still sensitive.

sensitive.context: I told Mom it is okay to use some ibuprofen in case his mouth or jaws are still sensitive.

chew gum.context: It is okay to chew gum and it is okay to eat crunchy foods such as potato chips.

crunchy foods.context: It is okay to chew gum and it is okay to eat crunchy foods such as potato chips.

potato chips.context: It is okay to chew gum and it is okay to eat crunchy foods such as potato chips.

chronic sinusitis.context: The pathologist described the expected changes of chronic sinusitis and chronic hypertrophic tonsillitis and adenoiditis, and there were no atypical findings on the laboratories.

chronic hypertrophic tonsillitis and ade.context: The pathologist described the expected changes of chronic sinusitis and chronic hypertrophic tonsillitis and adenoiditis, and there were no atypical findings on the laboratories.

atypical findings.context: The pathologist described the expected changes of chronic sinusitis and chronic hypertrophic tonsillitis and adenoiditis, and there were no atypical findings on the laboratories.

laboratories.context: The pathologist described the expected changes of chronic sinusitis and chronic hypertrophic tonsillitis and adenoiditis, and there were no atypical findings on the laboratories.

Dr. XYZ.context: I had written to Dr. XYZ to let her know of the findings.

family doctor.context: The child will continue his regular followup visits with his family doctor,
